00047 netsnmp_mib_handler *
00048 netsnmp_get_mode_end_call_handler(netsnmp_mode_handler_list *endlist)
00049 {
00050     netsnmp_mib_handler *me =
00051         netsnmp_create_handler("mode_end_call",
00052                                netsnmp_mode_end_call_helper);
00053 
00054     if (!me)
00055         return NULL;
00056 
00057     me->myvoid = endlist;
00058     return me;
00059 }
00060 
00067 netsnmp_mode_handler_list *
00068 netsnmp_mode_end_call_add_mode_callback(netsnmp_mode_handler_list *endlist,
00069                                         int mode,
00070                                         netsnmp_mib_handler *callbackh) {
00071     netsnmp_mode_handler_list *ptr, *ptr2;
00072     ptr = SNMP_MALLOC_TYPEDEF(netsnmp_mode_handler_list);
00073     if (!ptr)
00074         return NULL;
00075     
00076     ptr->mode = mode;
00077     ptr->callback_handler = callbackh;
00078     ptr->next = NULL;
00079 
00080     if (!endlist)
00081         return ptr;
00082 
00083     /* get to end */
00084     for(ptr2 = endlist; ptr2->next != NULL; ptr2 = ptr2->next);
00085 
00086     ptr2->next = ptr;
00087     return endlist;
00088 }
00089     
00091 int
00092 netsnmp_mode_end_call_helper(netsnmp_mib_handler *handler,
00093                             netsnmp_handler_registration *reginfo,
00094                             netsnmp_agent_request_info *reqinfo,
00095                             netsnmp_request_info *requests)
00096 {
00097 
00098     int             ret;
00099     int             ret2 = SNMP_ERR_NOERROR;
00100     netsnmp_mode_handler_list *ptr;
00101 
00102     /* always call the real handlers first */
00103     ret = netsnmp_call_next_handler(handler, reginfo, reqinfo,
00104                                     requests);
00105 
00106     /* then call the callback handlers */
00107     for(ptr = handler->myvoid; ptr; ptr = ptr->next) {
00108         if (ptr->mode == NETSNMP_MODE_END_ALL_MODES ||
00109             reqinfo->mode == ptr->mode) {
00110             ret2 = netsnmp_call_handler(ptr->callback_handler, reginfo,
00111                                              reqinfo, requests);
00112             if (ret != SNMP_ERR_NOERROR)
00113                 ret = ret2;
00114         }
00115     }
00116     
00117     return ret2;
00118 }
